upload.title: Upload Data File

form.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for this file
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a description for this file

errors.noFileSelected: Please select a file to upload

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a .sav, .xlsx, .csv, .ods, or .parquet file
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}

errors.unknownError: An error occurred. Please try again.

tableActions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

deleteDialog.title: Delete Data File

deleteDialog.error: Failed to delete data file. Please try again.
